text:
Looking for some input on where to store data.  I have the following Hierarchy:  Product Family -> Product Group -> Product.    The main goal is to store data for displaying dynamically in the CMS.  I can build these relationships in HUBDB.   We would also like the products to be stored as Product objects to be used in the CMS.
Should we maintain two sets of data,  a product hubdb table for CMS use and products in the CRM?
Can we build relations between Products and a HUBDB table?
Are there any limitations to displaying Products on CMS pages?
